Docs.summary: Defines the contract for a resource utilization publisher that gets invoked whenever resource utilization is computed.

Public Function PublishAsync (utilization As ResourceUtilization, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As ValueTask

Docs.param: A snapshot of the system's current resource utilization.
A used to cancel the publish operation.
Docs.summary: This method is invoked by the monitoring infrastructure whenever resource utilization is computed.
Docs.returns: A value task to track the publication operation.
